alert.note: Alert for Wind River Mountains East; Wind River Mountains West (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 29 at 3:16AM MDT until March 30 at 7:00AM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM MDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of 3 to 7 inches above 7500 ft. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Wind River Mountains, including South Pass. * WHEN...Until 7 AM MDT Wednesday. The most intense snow is expected this afternoon and evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult with intense snow showers limiting visibility at times. South Pass will be the main travel corridor affected by these wintry conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Wind River Mountains East; Wind River Mountains West
